header.title: CosPropertyService_PropertySetDefFactory

erlref.modulesummary: This module implements the OMG CosPropertyService::PropertySetDefFactory interface.

description.p:
To get access to the record definitions for the structures use:
-include_lib("cosProperty/include/CosPropertyService.hrl").

func.name: create_propertysetdef(Factory) ->
func.fsummary: Create a new PropertySetDefwith no predefined settings

desc.p: This operation creates a new PropertySetDef with no predefined settings.

func.name: create_constrained_propertysetdef(Factory, PropertyTypes, PropertyDefs) -> Reply
func.fsummary: Create a new PropertySetDefwith specified constraints

type.v: PropertyDefs = [#'CosPropertyService_PropertyDef'{property_name = Name, property_value = Value, property_mode = Mode}]
Mode = normal | read_only | fixed_normal | fixed_readonly | undefined

desc.p: This operation creates a new PropertySetDef with specific constraints. PropertyTypes states allowed TypeCode's and PropertyDefs valid CosPropertyService::PropertyDef data.

func.name: create_initial_propertysetdef(Factory, PropertyDefs) -> Reply
func.fsummary: Create a new PropertySetDefwith specified initial properties

type.v: PropertyDefs = [#'CosPropertyService_PropertyDef'{property_name = Name, property_value = Value, property_mode = Mode}]
Mode = normal | read_only | fixed_normal | fixed_readonly | undefined
Reason = invalid_property_name | conflicting_property | property_not_found | unsupported_type_code | unsupported_property | unsupported_mode | fixed_property | read_only_property

desc.p: This operation creates a new PropertySetDef with specific initial properties.
